# Show how to generate simulated datasets for model testing in Python and R

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# First generate some dummy data for the example
set.seed(42)
df <- tibble(
    index_ = seq(1, 100),
    value = rnorm(100, mean = 50, sd = 10),
    category = 'init',
    status = sample(c('win', 'lose', 'draw'), 
                    size = 100, 
                    prob = c(.48, .48, 0.04), 
                    replace = TRUE))

df %>% count(status)
```
